metadata.title: CVE-2024-37388 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An XML External Entity (XXE) vulnerability in the ebookmeta.get_metadatafunction of lxml before v4.9.1 allows attackers to access sensitiveinformation or cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via crafted XML input.

criterions.comment: lxml package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
